  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">¿Dónde?</string>
            <string language="en">Where?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wo?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Où ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Onde?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dove?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πού;</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica interactiva (MUD) adreçada al cicle inicial de primària que treballa el lèxic especific per indicar situacions en l'espai: izquierda/derecha, delante/detrás, dentro/fuera, encima/debajo. Conté activitats de pràctica (Practica) i d'avaluació (Avalua't) que presenten situacions quotidianes en què cal utilitzar el vocabulari amb precisió.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on specific vocabulary for spatial position: left/right, in front of/behind, inside/outside, on/under, etc. in Spanish. Aimed at 6- to 8-year-olds, it includes practice and assessment activities presenting everyday situations requiring the correct use of these lexical items.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material educatiu</string>
            <string language="en">instructional materials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació primària</string>
            <string language="en">primary education</string>
            <string language="es">educación primaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ensenyament</string>
            <string language="en">teaching</string>
            <string language="es">enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
spezifischem Wortschatz für räumliche Position: left/right, in
vorderem of/behind, in inside/outside, in on/under, in etc. auf 
spanisch. Angestrebte 6 zu 8-year-olds, schließt es die Praxis-
und Einschätzungsaktivitäten ein, welche die täglichen Situationen 
darstellen, die den korrekten Gebrauch von diesen lexikalischen 
Einträgen benötigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur le 
vocabulaire spécifique pour la position spatiale : left/right, 
dans of/behind, inside/outside, on/under, etc. avant dans l'Espagnol. 
6 visés à 8-year-olds, il inclut des activités de pratique et
d'évaluation exposant des situations journalières exigeant 
l'utilisation correcte de ces éléments lexicaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no vocabulário 
específico para a posição spatial: left/right, em of/behind, 
em inside/outside, em on/under, etc. dianteiros no espanhol. 6- 
visados a 8-year-olds, inclui as atividades da prática e da 
avaliação que apresentam as situações diárias que requerem o uso 
correto destes artigos lexicais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) su 
vocabolario specifico per la posizione spaziale: left/right, in
of/behind, in inside/outside, in on/under, ecc. anteriori nello 
Spagnolo. 6 puntati su a 8-year-olds, include le attività di 
valutazione e di pratica che presentano le situazioni giornalieri che 
richiedono l'utilizzazione corretta di queste unità lessicali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στο 
συγκεκριμένο λεξιλόγιο για τη χωρική θέση: 
αριστερό/σωστός, μπροστά από/πίσω, μέσα/έξω,/κάτω, κ.λπ.
στα ισπανικά. Στοχευμένο σε 6 στο 8-έτος, περιλαμβάνει τις 
δραστηριότητες πρακτικής και αξιολόγησης που παρουσιάζουν τις 
καθημερινές καταστάσεις που απαιτούν τη σωστή χρήση αυτών των 
λεκτικών τεμαχίων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtsmaterialien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Primärausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel didactique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation primaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel didactique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">materiais instrutivos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução preliminar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">materiais de ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiale didattico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione primaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiali didattici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρωτοβάθμια εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικά υλικά</string>
          </keyword>
